name: NSQIP_PAT_CONTACT_RECS
description: This table contains child RDI records for follow-up patient contacts for NSQIP registry data for the surgeries that are selected for NSQIP submission. It is used in conjunction with NSQIP_INFO table.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NSQIP_PAT_CONTACT_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The child record associated with the follow-up patient contact.
